name: debug-mcp
description: Full-stack debugging and error correlation MCP server for CAIO dashboard
author: CAIO RevOps Team

capabilities.error_correlation: Correlates frontend browser errors with backend service failures
capabilities.log_aggregation: Aggregates logs from audit trail, retry queue, and Python logs
capabilities.ui_capture: Captures screenshots, DOM snapshots, and console errors via Playwright
capabilities.request_tracing: Traces requests through the stack using correlation IDs
capabilities.circuit_breaker_monitoring: Monitors circuit breaker states and failure counts
